Leland follows the story of Leland P. Fitzgerald (Ryan Gosling), a disaffected teenager who has apparently murdered a severely retarded peer, the brother of his would-be lover Allison (Hilary Swank). A woman who hates cats (Alice Krige) and her son (Brian Krause) have moved into a small town, and must deal with a mean cat. The film, based on Stephenie Meyer’s novel The Host, is a story about the lives of the people who live in small town and their relationships with one another.
